mapper.select: SELECT ctno, sale_c, title, hprice, region, trading, name FROM camera ORDER BY ctno DESC
mapper.insert: insert into CAMERA(ctno,category, name,passwd,sale_c,product_c,trading, region, hprice ,p_day,quantity ,email ,phone ,title ,content) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ctno), 0)+1 as ctno FROM CAMERA), #{category}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{sale_c}, #{product_c},#{trading}, #{region}, #{hprice}, #{p_day}, #{quantity}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{title}, #{content})
